name: Casino Crime
description:
Start your criminal career in the glamorous world of gambling! Help luck along a little in your own casino and take your guests to the cleaners! Whether it's easy pickpocketing or elaborate card tricks: the only good guest is a fleeced guest! Welcome to the family!

FULL FEATURED & AD-FREE (no ads)!

Features:
- Exciting casino manager game with Mafia connections
- Slot machines, Blackjack and Roulette
- Use dirty tricks to cheat your punters
- Pick pockets to earn some quick money
- Unscrupulous croupiers with a talent for crime
- Gambling addicts with their individual needs
